sqls.sql: UPDATE pd_wkc_wka_import_tmp SET pd_wkc_wka_id = @pd_wkc_wka_id, wkc_id = @wkc_id, wka_no = @wka_no, wka_name = @wka_name, wka_desc = @wka_desc, pd_wkc_wka_rmk1 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk1, pd_wkc_wka_rmk2 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk2, pd_wkc_wka_rmk3 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk3, pd_wkc_wka_rmk4 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk4, pd_wkc_wka_rmk5 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk5, pd_wkc_wka_rmk6 = @pd_wkc_wka_rmk6, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host;
